meanings.definition: A person who constructs or repairs something.
meanings.sent1: The wrights in the village fixed the broken fence.
meanings.sent2: The wrights were busy building a new house in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The wrights decided to have a race to see who could repair the most items in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The wrights' hands moved like lightning as they repaired the damaged roof.
meanings.sent5: The wrights' skill in construction was unmatched in the entire town.

meanings.definition: The act or process of constructing or repairing something.
meanings.sent1: Watching the wrights build the bridge was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The wrights' workshop was filled with tools for their craft.
meanings.sent3: The wrights' construction work was so good, it seemed like magic.
meanings.sent4: The wrights' dedication to their work was evident in every project they completed.
meanings.sent5: The wrights' attention to detail made their repairs last for years.
